General.Name: Sociedad Punta del Cobre S.A
General.Description: Sociedad Punta del Cobre S.A., engages in the development and exploitation of mineral resources primarily in the Atacama Region. The company primarily explores for copper, gold, and silver concentrates. It holds interest in the Punta del Cobre mine, the Manto de Cobre mine and the Granate mine, San Jose, and Biocobre mines located in the Atacama Region. The company also holds a 100% interest in the El Espino project located in Coquimbo region; and the Tovaku mining project located in Antofagasta region. Sociedad Punta del Cobre S.A. was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Copiapó, Chile.
